detaileddescription.para: This array maps Vlan node id to coding enable condition. It is a const array whose value cannot be change.

detaileddescription.para: This array contains all coding enable conditions. It is used to clear enable conditions durning coding change. It is a const array whose value cannot be change.

memberdef.argsstring: (const TComChannel Channel, const uint16 NodeId, uint8 *const EnableCond)
memberdef.name: ErrGetNodeCodedDEMEnabCond

detaileddescription.para: This function is used to get the given Can/Vlan node DEM enable condition.
reentrant No context {task, ErrSetNodeCodedEnableCond} thread safe Yes multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous

simplesect.title: Security Relevance
simplesect.para: Not Security-Relevant.

parameterdescription.para: TComChannel Channel : COM channel whose enable condition to be checked.
uint16 NodeId : NodeId whose enable condition to be checked.
uint8 EnableCond - DEM enable condition which need to be returned.

simplesect.para: Std_ReturnType RetVal : E_OK in case of success, otherwise E_NOT_OK.

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: This function can be verified in following test: TEST_ErrGetNodeCodedDEMEnabCond

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: This function is given by VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.ECU_DIAG_Chorus.ErrHdl_MQB.SW Architecture.SW Requirements It satisfies the following Design Decision: This is a helper function which returns the DEM enable condition for the requested node ID for CAN's and VLAN's.

detaileddescription.para: This function sets MFL node enable conditions when node is coded on Can.

simplesect.para: Not Security-Relevant.
void

simplesect.title: Globals
simplesect.para: DK2_MFL : Value representing index of the MFL data in the DK2_BuiltInList array.

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: The enable condition should be called only when DK2 is coded.

briefdescription.para: Error Handler - Can and VLAN enable condition Handling.

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Include own header files in the testcase file (SWATT), no stubs for data types and function prototypes. Add software requirement IDs in the testcases.
